price: 1. Eleko ya kokata likambo ya bato ekomi pembeni, kasi bazali komitungisa te тропа yango mpe bapesi mokongo.
arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: iq'taraba lilnnāsi ḥisābuhum wahum fī ghaflatin muʿ'riḍūna
